snippet: The heiress Rachel Mellon eventually regretted her financial donations to John Edwards, an interior decorator who acted as a go-between testified in Mr. Edwards’s trial.
abstract: Bryan Huffman, interior decorator who acted as go-between for heiress Rachel Mellon and John Edwards, testifies at Edwards's financial corruption trial that Mellon eventually regretted her donations after learning that Edwards had used some of the money to hide his pregnant mistress Rielle Hunter.

byline.original: By WILLIAM DUPRE AND KIM SEVERSON

lead_paragraph: The heiress Rachel Mellon eventually regretted her financial donations to John Edwards, an interior decorator who acted as a go-between testified in Mr. Edwards’s trial.

headline.seo: The Heiress Rachel Mellon Regretted Donations to John Edwards, Go-Between Testifies
headline.main: Liaison Says Heiress Rued Edwards Donations
